product_name: Nikwax Tent and Gear SolarProof Waterproofing Spray
long_description: The Nikwax Tent and Gear SolarProof waterproofing spray adds UV protection and water repellency to tents, awnings, marquees, rucksacks, panniers, camera bags and more. Handy treatment lengthens the life of tents, outdoor gear and all weatherproof textiles. Non-aerosol, spray-on formula is water-based and easy to apply. One application can double the effective life of gear.
short_description: The Nikwax Tent and Gear SolarProof waterproofing spray adds UV protection and water repellency to tents, awnings, marquees, rucksacks, panniers, camera bags and more.
